title: enru nin
sahitya:
enru nin tEr varum innoli shevi pughum manruL naTanam sheyyum maNI nIlakaNThanE


anupallavi

  enrum en uLLamAm EkAnta arai tannai nanraNi sheidunnai nADit-tiranduLLEn


caraNam    ambalam anaiyadu Ayiram idazh viri ambuja hidayamun ATTuk-kughandadu 
mArbagham vimmiDa vazhi vizhi vaittu nAn ArvamAik-kAttuLLEn Ananda mUrtiyE
